item.title: HUB2: Fried chicken burger | Spicy agurkerelish, sprød hjertesalat, tomat og peber mayonnaise | Fried courgette burger | | – WEEK 29 – | Monday | Spaghetti Bolognese a la ragu | Served and topped with fresh shredded Parmigiano Reggiano, fresh basil and oregano | Spaghetti lentilbolo with green beluga lentils | Tuesday | Moroccan tangine with lemon chicken | Eggplant, peas, chickpeas and orange in spicy tomato sauce | Served with chunky couscous, apricots, raisins, mint and parsley | Moroccan tangine with lemon baked celeriac | Wednesday | Orzo in creamy parmesan and herb sauce | Baked- butternut squash, onion, pickled hokkaido, parsley and fried sage | Today’s cake | Rhubarb trifli with crème fraiche and nut crush | Thursday | Danish ”Frikadeller” | Traditional Danish meatballs with veal and pork | Served with fresh potato salad on spring vegetables, chives oil and a crisp green salad | Small beetroot patties | Friday | Spicy cucumber relish, crisp gem’s lettuce, tomato and pepper mayonnaise | Fried courgetti burger | Vegetar | Vegetarian

item.title: HUB1 – Kays: Pulled spicy kalkun med pitabrød, friteret salatløg, chili syltet tomater og urtecreme | – Week 29 – | | Monday | Indian curry with chicken flavored with coconut milk, warm spices, wild rice and homemade naan bread | flavored with coconut milk, warm spices, wild rice and homemade | naan bread | Tuesday | Danish pork roast with ramsons and citrus, served with new potatoes, brown sauce, pickled pearl onions topped with homemade | red cabbage salad | Wednesday | Oven-baked chimichanga with bean mash, tomato-onion relish, grated cheddar cheese, homemade pickled jalapenos and grilled corn | Thursday | Szechuan with oyster sauce marinated beef served with steamed basmati rice, green beans, fried peppers and topped with homemade bean sprouts | Friday | Pulled spicy turkey with pita bread, fried green onions, chili pickled tomatoes and herb cream | – UGE 29 – | Vegetar: Vegetar Indian curry med grillet blomkål | Vegetar: Vegetar deller med nye kartofler, skysauce, syltet perleløg toppet med hjemmelavet rødkålssalat | Vegetar: Szechuan med mild soya marineret kødprotein hertil dampet basmati ris, grønne bønner, stegte peberfrugter og toppet med hjemmelavet bønnespire | Vegetar: spicy stegt aubergine med pitabrød, friteret salatløg, chili syltet tomater og urtecreme | Vegetarian: Vegetarian Indian curry with grilled cauliflower | Vegetarian: Vegetarian meatballs with new potatoes, brown sauce, pickled pearl onions topped with homemade red cabbage salad | Vegetarian: Szechuan with mild soy marinated meat protein served with steamed basmati rice, green beans, fried peppers and topped with homemade bean sprouts | Vegetarian: spicy fried eggplant with pita bread, fried green onions, chili pickled tomatoes and herb cream
